definition: owing or owed feudal allegiance and service, a feudal lord entitled to allegiance and service
details:
adjective
- owing or owed feudal allegiance and service
= example: owing or owed feudal allegiance and service
noun
- a feudal lord entitled to allegiance and service
= synonyms: liege lord
- a person holding a fief
= synonyms: feudatory, vassal, liegeman, liege subject
